mapper.sql: event_id, ent_cn_name, exit_type, event_title, user_name, happen_date
mapper.select:
select a.* from pm_exit_event a inner join pm_id_user_exit_event b on a.event_id=b.event_id where
a.exit_type in #{item}
(a.ent_cn_name like concat('%',#{key},'%') or a.event_title like concat('%',#{key},'%')) and
b.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY happen_date DESC limit #{from},10

select a.* from pm_exit_event a inner join pm_id_fund_exit_event b on a.event_id=b.event_id where
a.exit_type in #{item}
(a.ent_cn_name like concat('%',#{key},'%') or a.event_title like concat('%',#{key},'%')) and
b.fund_id=#{fundId} ORDER BY happen_date DESC limit #{from},10
select a.* from pm_exit_event a inner join pm_id_fund_exit_event b on a.event_id=b.event_id where b.fund_id=#{fundId}
mapper.insert:
insert into pm_exit_event
event_id,
ent_cn_name,
exit_type,
event_title,
user_name,
happen_date,
#{eventId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{entCnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{exitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{eventTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{happenDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update pm_exit_event
ent_cn_name = #{entCnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exit_type = #{exitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
event_title = #{eventTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
happen_date = #{happenDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where event_id = #{eventId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update pm_exit_event set ent_cn_name = #{entCnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exit_type = #{exitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, event_title = #{eventTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, happen_date = #{happenDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where event_id = #{eventId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
